# Automateverse GitHub Pages Website Project

This workspace contains a simple, responsive static website designed for hosting on GitHub Pages.

## Project Overview

- **Type**: Static Website
- **Technologies**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
- **Hosting**: GitHub Pages
- **Structure**: Single-page responsive design

## Key Features

- Responsive mobile-first design
- Modern CSS with flexbox and grid layouts
- Interactive JavaScript functionality
- SEO-optimized HTML structure
- GitHub Pages deployment ready

## Development

- Use the Live Server task to run a local development server
- The website is accessible at http://localhost:8000 when the server is running
- All source files are in the root directory with organized CSS and JS folders

## Deployment

Ready for deployment to GitHub Pages - see README.md for deployment instructions.
